instructions.name: award_bounty
docs: Sponsor selects a winning Answer

instructions.name: claim_bounty
docs: Answer author claims awarded bounty

instructions.name: claim_tips
docs: Claim all tips from tip vault to owner's main vault.
All-or-nothing: claims entire vault balance.

instructions.name: close_bounty_no_award
docs: Sponsor explicitly rejects all answers

instructions.name: create_bounty
docs: Create a new bounty and escrow funds

instructions.name: create_question
docs: Core MVP voting instruction.
User pays from their vault; everything is denominated in BLING.

instructions.name: deposit
docs: User deposits from their wallet into the program-controlled vault.

instructions.name: distribute_creator_reward
docs: Distribute creator reward from frozen settlement.
Reads creator_fee from PostMintPayout and transfers it to creator's vault.

instructions.name: distribute_parent_post_share
docs: Distribute parent post share from frozen settlement.
Reads mother_fee from PostMintPayout and transfers it to parent post's pot.

instructions.name: distribute_protocol_fee
docs: Distribute protocol fee from frozen settlement.
Reads protocol_fee from PostMintPayout and transfers it to protocol treasury.

instructions.name: expire_bounty
docs: Canonicalize expiry on-chain (permissionless)

instructions.name: increase_bounty
docs: Top up an existing bounty

instructions.name: reclaim_bounty
docs: Sponsor retrieves funds after non-award

accounts.name: protocol_token_treasury_token_account
docs: NEW treasury token account for this mint, canonical PDA.

instructions.name: send_token
docs: Send tokens from sender's user vault to recipient's user vault.
Direct vault-to-vault transfer without intermediate accounts.

instructions.name: tip
docs: Tip another user from sender's vault to recipient's tip vault.
Tips accumulate in the recipient's tip vault until they claim.

instructions.name: update_valid_payment_withdrawable
docs: Update the withdrawable flag for a valid payment token

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw with possible penalty based on social interactions.
You can later implement:
effective_amount = amount * (10000 - user.withdraw_penalty_bps()) / 10000

errors.name: BlingCannotBeAlternativePayment
errors.msg: BLING cannot be registered as an alternative payment

errors.name: AlternativePaymentAlreadyRegistered
errors.msg: Alternative payment already registered for this mint

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: user account does not belong to the payer

errors.name: InvalidSignatureInstruction
errors.msg: Invalid or missing Ed25519 signature verification instruction

errors.name: AnswerMustTargetQuestion
errors.msg: Answer must target a Question post

errors.name: AnswerTargetNotRoot
errors.msg: Answer target must be a Root post

errors.name: BountyAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Bounty already exists for this question, sponsor, and token

errors.name: AnswerMismatch
errors.msg: Answer does not match bounty question

types.name: ForcedOutcome
docs: Forced settlement outcome for Answers

fields.name: reserved
docs: padding to prevent future breakage

fields.name: price_in_bling
docs: how much is 1 token in BLING votes -
1 USDC = 10_000 BLING for example
1 SOL = 1_000_000_000 BLING for example
This value is lamport-free. So 1 BLING = 1 BLING
